actions.text: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Istook.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: At the end of title VI (before the short title), insert the following: \   SEC. . The amount otherwise provided by this Act for deposit in the Federal Buildings Fund is hereby reduced by $152,979,000, and, notwithstanding any other provision of this Act, the amount available from revenues and collections deposited into the Fund shall be available for necessary expenses of real property management and related activities not otherwise provided for in the aggregate amount of $8,619,023,000.
purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount for deposit into the Federal Building Fund by $152,979,000, and, notwithstanding any other provision of the Act, to provide that the amount available from revenues and collections deposited into the Fund shall be available for necessary expenses of real property management and related activities not otherwise provided for in the aggregate amount of $8,619,023,000.
